How can I transform named tuple of vectors `t = (a=[1,2,3], b=[5,6,7])`
to a vector of named tuples `v = [(a=1, b=5), (a=2, b=6), (a=3, b=7)]` ?
`v = collect(zip(t...))` generates vector of tuples with no names.
